abstract.p: Godiva Chocolatier and Fry Multimedia develop computer software that shows map of shortest route from anywhere is world to nearest Godiva Chocolatier outlet (S)

block.p: Two centuries of stunning advances in communications and information technology have brought humanity at last to this. It is now possible, with a few clicks on your Web-enabled cellular phone or hand-held digital assistant, to instantly obtain a map of the shortest route from wherever you are in the world to the nearest Godiva Chocolatier outlet.

The software to perform this miracle was announced last week by Godiva and Fry Multimedia, an e-business development company in Ann Arbor, Mich., that helped Godiva create its five-year-old Web site, Godiva.com. The underlying technology for the system, made by Ecliptic Systems of Palo Alto, Calif., has a lot to keep track of -- 232 Godiva retail shops and 2,500 Godiva counters in department and specialty stores.
